name: Potential Elasticsearch database exposed to the internet (ports 9200 and/or 9300)
query: { securityGroups(where: {vms_NOT: null, rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", AND: [{OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}]}, {OR: [{sourceFromPort_LTE: 9200, sourceToPort_GTE: 9200}, {sourceFromPort_LTE: 9300, sourceToPort_GTE: 9300}]}]}}) {...AssetFragment}}
